channel.title: Hack in TTH - Pic Included
channel.description:
My coowner, [b]NinjaSoD[/b], decided to abuse his powers and ban EVERYONE - including me and Mod Grim.
(look near the top; it says he used the ::banuser newb 2341) [IMG]http://img182.imageshack.us/img182/6901/00000000yr6.gif[/img]
But, good for me, I had a backup of the file.
Yes, we lost over [b]40[/b] character files, but [b]NinjaSoD[/b] can't ban anyone evermore.
So, without further ado, my new coowner is....
[i]Please join the server to find out.[/i]
Oh, and if you were one of those unlucky bitches who lost their file, please make a new one.
[b]Thanks, Newb 2341[/b] ~~~~~~~~ Ninja was deleted. ~~~~~~~~ I don't really care if this is the "wrong section." He was wrong, and I'm going to post this.
